title: FS: T206 Dummy Taylor Piedmont SGC 2.5 SOLD
author: Moonlight Graham

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Dummy Taylor Piedmont SGC 2.5 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Card has really nice colors-but it does have a small crease that runs from about the middle of Taylor to his left elbow. It's really hard to see though. But like I said this card really pops! The price is SOLD delivered PayPal no fees please. Thank you for looking.

Joe K.
